hints.content:
An $\blueE{\text{even}}$ number is a number that can be split into $2$ equal groups.

We find $\blueE{\text{even}}$ numbers by making sure every object in the group has a pair.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9d50cd961bb1ee962eb60cc708a5e737e9d4486c)

Examples of $\blueE{\text{even}}$ numbers are $\blueE2, \blueE4,\blueE6, \blueE8, \blueE{10},  . .  .$

An $\maroonD{\text{odd}}$ number **cannot** be split into $2$ equal groups. 

We find $\maroonD{\text{odd}}$ numbers by trying to pair objects and finding there is **not** always a pair.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/10c3af09ebfcd0c6d05b4edd219f33894cc4d8b9)

Examples of $\maroonD{\text{odd}}$ numbers are $\maroonD1, \maroonD3, \maroonD5, \maroonD7, \maroonD9, . . . $

In this image, there are $\blueE{10}$ lady bugs.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3adcde3ec9c1b6ef7717bccbf27aaa1e278aa641)

Each lady bugs has a pair, so there are an even number of lady bugs.

In this image, there are $\maroonD{15}$ seals.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ff15932a419eb4554e92b49b6b251b0a0f69ed01)

Each seal does **not** have a pair, so there are an odd number of seals.

In this image, there are $\maroonD{13}$ monkeys.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f5b248af9d13ffe8c7263bb7396fdbcba6909b61)

Each monkey does **not** have a pair, so there are an odd number of monkeys.

Here is the completed table:

Image | Even/Odd
- | - | -
![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/752778a0c2de9276fb8ff379f0dd71a06553885b) | **Even**
![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2068d37e77af08cbc4fd3d48f6bce283fc8cd3c5) | **Odd**
![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f8e764857257fb85de4637f8d502be387d7119af)  | **Odd**

question.content:
**Determine whether the number of objects is even or odd.**

Image | Even/Odd
- | - | -

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2068d37e77af08cbc4fd3d48f6bce283fc8cd3c5) | [[☃ dropdown 2]]
![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f8e764857257fb85de4637f8d502be387d7119af)  | [[☃ dropdown 3]]
